nodes.text: Tree-drum music was a form of music. The Wookiee species played tree-drum music to celebrate a holiday called Life Day as early as 1,500,000 BBY. During the Black Fleet Crisis, the Wookiee Chewbacca enjoyed this style and sometimes played it quite loudly.

Tree-drum music was briefly mentioned in Before the Storm (1996), the first novel of Michael P. Kube-McDowell's The Black Fleet Crisis trilogy. In 2014, the music was mentioned in "Slugthrowers: An Overview of Popular Music and Musicians in a Galaxy Far, Far Away," an article written by Edward M. Erdelac for the Star Wars Blog.
